example.name: all arguments
example.text: I would not want [*-2] to be one of those writers who [*T*-1] begin each morning by [*] exclaiming , `` O Gogol , O Chekhov , O Thackeray and Dickens , what would you have made [*T*-3] of [a bomb shelter]-1 ornamented [*]-1 with four plaster-of-Paris ducks , a birdbath , and three composition gnomes with long beards and red mobcaps '' ? ?
example.arg: with four plaster-of-Paris ducks , a birdbath , and three composition gnomes with long beards and red mobcaps
